issue.title: [C++] Add option for user-defined version identifier for Arrow libraries
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8683](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8683). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be useful to be able to "watermark" shared libraries with e.g. the git hash to determine the exact origin of a particular build of the project. The version identifier could default to the current git revision but be overridden in the CMake invocation
